page.title: 08BURNOPFIELD SOCIETIES/CLUBS.
page.content: There is a working men's club in the village part of a large federation of clubs.There are 3 Youth Clubs,one in the school,one in the Methodist Chapel and one run by the Gospel Fellowship.There are 2 cricket clubs, Lintz C.C.and Burnopfield C.C.with great rivalry between the two.there are also two Women's Institutes a Tennis Club and a Bowling Club. For children there are several organisations: 1.{2nd.Burnopfield St.James' Scouts. 2.{2nd.Burnopfield St.James' Cubs. 3.{1st.Burnopfield St.James' Brownies. 4.{2nd.Burnopfield St.James' Brownies. 5.{15th.Burnopfield N.W.Durham B.B. Also a Conservation group concerned with the area meets regularly in the Community Centre.
